To collect data goal sexual functioning among prostate cancer survivor partner follow cancer treatment order identify specific component intervention future grant submission psychosexual need prostate cancer survivor . DOC.criteria: Prostate cancer survivor : willing able provide inform consent ; able read , write , speak English ; marry marriedlike relationship ; complete radiation surgery prostate cancer 6 month 5 year ago Partners prostate cancer survivor must : willing able provide inform consent ; able read , write , speak English Prostate cancer survivor exclude undergone androgen deprivation therapy within past 6 month partner refuse participate
